Common Symptoms: Dry skin, itching, red patches, inflammation, scaling, crusting, redness, cracked skin, swelling

Disease: Warts, Molluscum, and other Viral Infections
Common Symptoms: Raised bumps, rough texture, small flesh-colored growths, sometimes itchy or painful, small bumps, brown growths, itching
New or changing mole, asymmetry, irregular borders, varied colors, bleeding, itching
Intense itching, dry scaly skin, red inflamed patches, especially in folds of skin, itching, rashes, swelling, crusting
Pearly or waxy bump, flat flesh-colored lesion, bleeding sore that doesn't heal, scaly area
Recommended Treatment: Mohs surgery, radiation therapy, topical chemo

Common Symptoms: Small and dark brown spots, flat or raised moles, typically uniform in shape and color,
Recommended Treatment: Observation, excision if suspicious or for cosmetic reasons

Common Symptoms: Waxy or wart-like growth, brown/tan/black, scaly surface, can be flat or slightly raised

Disease: Psoriasis, Lichen Planus, and related diseases
Common Symptoms: Thick red patches with silvery scales, purple flat-topped bumps, severe itching, cracked skin

Disease: Seborrheic Keratoses and other Benign Tumors
Common Symptoms: Brown/black growths, waxy/stuck-on appearance, generally painless,
Recommended Treatment: Cryosurgery, curettage, no treatment if asymptomatic

Disease: Tinea, Ringworm, Candidiasis, and other Fungal Infections
Common Symptoms: Red circular rashes, itching, peeling skin, white patches in mouth or moist areas, scaling, cracking skin
Recommended Treatment: Topical antifungals, oral antifungals in severe cases
